title: Glasnost: Enabling End Users to Detect Trafﬁc Differentiation
description: Description of the rationale behind the Glasnost test and the way it can help expose opaque ISP network management by its architects—NSDI 2010
authors: M. Dischinger, M. Marcon, S. Guha, K. P. Gummadi, R. Mahajan, S. Saroiu
